plot: No matter the weather, and ignoring defeats and Disneyfied arenas and risking black eyes, Fat Manni and Long Heinz are hardcore football fans. But what's the reason for this fanatacism?
title: Warum halb vier?
plot_es: No matter the weather, and ignoring defeats and Disneyfied arenas and risking black eyes, Fat Manni and Long Heinz are hardcore football fans. But what's the reason for this fanatacism?
plot_en: No matter the weather, and ignoring defeats and Disneyfied arenas and risking black eyes, Fat Manni and Long Heinz are hardcore football fans. But what's the reason for this fanatacism?
